ISSUE.TITLE: Document connecting to websocket for 3rd parties
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ##### ISSUE TYPE I wasn't able to find any info on how do I connect to websocket. Only this issue: https://github.com/ansible/awx/issues/2468 I've tried to create a Websocket client with Nodejs and subscribe to jobs status changes with this payload: ``` "groups": {"jobs": ["status_changed"], "schedules": ["changed"], "control": ["limit_reached_1"]} ``` but the messages just don't come from the server, although there're no error messages returned from it. ##### SUMMARY It's not clear how to connect to websocket server. Can this be documented? Thanks
